item.title: Apple is the big winner in Google antitrust penalty ruling
item.description: The iPhone maker may license generative artificial intelligence products outside of the Google ecosystem.

item.description: Mike Santoli breaks down Wednesday's market action.

item.title: Breaking down the charts on this outperforming medical device maker

item.title: Trading this pharma giant through options as the market turns more defensive
item.description: Options trader Tony Zhang explains this options trade on a pharmaceutical giant.

item.title: Solana was down 70% at one point this year. Now, it's getting its mojo back
item.description: Institutional interest has been shifting toward Solana in recent weeks as bitcoin and ether remain in their pullbacks.
